Articles.Content:
So I recently decided to get myself a better computer. After I got my PC up and running I reinstalled all my steam games. so I went and tested them everything worked fine, went and installed mods for ksp and all of a sudden mono.dll is causing the game to crash before the menu screen. here is what the log says

Quote

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.4.0p4_b15b5ae035b7]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0033:64480e18.

Error occurred at 2017-05-30_143508.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe, run by KRaney.
49% memory in use.
12238 MB physical memory [6163 MB free].
16610 MB paging file [9530 MB free].
134217728 MB user address space [134215975 MB free].
Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:
RDI:    0x3757d100  RSI: 0x37414cd0  RAX:   0x00000000
RBX:    0x00000007  RCX: 0x00000006  RDX:   0x00000061
RIP:    0x64480e18  RBP: 0x010fcf70  SegCs: 0x00000033
EFlags: 0x00010206  RSP: 0x010fce70  SegSs: 0x0000002b
R8:    0x28e8a0fa  R9: 0x010fcfe8  R10:   0x3757d020
R11:    0x010fce00  R12: 0x3757d100  R13:   0x00000053
R14:    0x36bc8818  R15: 0x00000001

Bytes at CS:EIP:
48 8b 10 48 8b ce 48 8b d8 e8 4e f7 ff ff 48 8b 
 

The mods I have installed are BDarmory, 5Dim military contract pack, Contract Configurator, Hyperedit, and MechJeb 2 (yes i know kerbal engineer exists I just prefer mechjeb)

Every place I have looked for a fix on this says to upgrade your ram. But I have 12GB of ram to spare so that shouldn't really be a problem. People also say to delete the file causing the problem but mono.dll is a core file of ksp so that's not an option.

Im using ksp 64bit version if you are wondering.

If anyone can help me fix this problem I will be extremely grateful.
fixed my own problem. BDarmory was somehow outdated (even though i uninstalled and reinstalled many different times....)

KSP has recently been updated to version 1.3. Of the mods you mentioned, 5Dim military contract pack and Contrat Configurator are not compatible with 1.3 (5Dim contract pack isn't even compatible with KSP 1.1+ without editing config files, from the thread).

I suggest you either remove these mods, or wait for them to be updated and revert back to 1.2 or earlier in the meantime.

 

Edit: ninja'd by OP

Edited May 30, 2017 by Gaarst
